des:
CG Air’s ConnectedTub system allows you to operate your hydromassage bathtub’s functions through voice command or through the app*. This allows you to control your air system, whirlpool, chromatherapy, heated surface or any electronic component that is installed on your bathtub. 
*Requires the feature to be installed by the bathtub manufacturer.

To enable the skill, you must log with your Amazon account.
Below is an example of commands that will be available, depending on the hydromassage systems installed on your bathtub:

Blower commands:
Turn the blower on: Alexa, turn the blower on 
Turn the blower off: Alexa, turn the blower off
Set blower speed: Alexa, set blower to x% (1% to 100%)
Start wave mode: Alexa, turn the wave on
Stop wave mode: Alexa, turn the wave off
Start pulse mode: Alexa, turn the pulse on
Stop pulse mode: Alexa, turn the pulse off

Chromatherapy commands:
Turn chromatherapy on: Alexa, set the Chromatherapy color to (color) 
Turn chromatherapy off: Alexa, set the Chromatherapy color to black
Set chromatherapy to white: Alexa, set the Chromatherapy color to white
Set chromatherapy to turquoise: Alexa, set the Chromatherapy color to turquoise 
Set chromatherapy to blue: Alexa, set the Chromatherapy color to blue 
Set chromatherapy to magenta: Alexa, set the Chromatherapy color to magenta 
Set chromatherapy to red: Alexa, set the Chromatherapy color to red
Set chromatherapy to orange: Alexa, set the Chromatherapy color to orange
Set chromatherapy to yellow: Alexa, set the Chromatherapy color to yellow
Set chromatherapy to green: Alexa, set the Chromatherapy color to green
Set chromatherapy rainbow mode: Alexa, turn rainbow on/off

ComfortWarmTM commands:
Set ComfortWarmTM to high: Alexa, set the ComfortWarm to 100%
Set ComfortWarmTM to high: Alexa, set the ComfortWarm to 75%
Set ComfortWarmTM to high: Alexa, set the ComfortWarm to 50%
Set ComfortWarmTM to high: Alexa, set the ComfortWarm to 0%
